about_the_game:
Listen to the official soundtrack of the Domiverse Tournament™ broadcasted through all the universe during the competition.

Discover the ambience of each gladiator’s planets through these musics composed by Fabot.

  • 1. Pama Pax (02:27)
  • 2. Gnisnurf (03:01)
  • 3. Kraoutet (02:35)
  • 4. Usui (02:31)
  • 5. Yitja (02:43)
  • 6. Blomzo (02:21)
  • 7. Cubozoa 5 (02:47)
  • 8. Pama Belli (02:22)
  • 9. Domiverse Arena (03:31)
  • 10. Ro Hanga (03:22)
  • 11. Earth (02:23)
  • 12. HUD (02:36)
  • 13. Trailer (01:09)
  • 14. Teaser (00:33)
detailed_description:
Listen to the official soundtrack of the Domiverse Tournament™ broadcasted through all the universe during the competition.

Discover the ambience of each gladiator’s planets through these musics composed by Fabot.

  • 1. Pama Pax (02:27)
  • 2. Gnisnurf (03:01)
  • 3. Kraoutet (02:35)
  • 4. Usui (02:31)
  • 5. Yitja (02:43)
  • 6. Blomzo (02:21)
  • 7. Cubozoa 5 (02:47)
  • 8. Pama Belli (02:22)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7 Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

name: Domiverse - Official Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
